Hart Equity & Criminal Court
Commonwealth
vs } On Indictment for an assault and battery Judgment at the April Term 1861 for $40.
Oliver Clark William Clark Fleming Short

To his excellency B Magoffin Gov. of Kentucky your petitioners citizens of Hart county would respectfully request of your excellency to remit the above mentioned fine believing as we the case is one in which the executive as clemency may be properly exercised
